Public_Python_Sim 0.5 Alpha documentation
next | modules | index

Welcome to Public_Python_Sim’s documentation!¶

Public_Sim Is a simple 2d graph based routing simulator. This simulator has been designed for academic use by Alexander Masterman at the University of Southampton. The graphic simulator uses a cartesian coordinate system for the stops within a network and a matrix of times needed to travel between any two nodes. These can be generated using Open Street Map data an the C++ based routing engine from the Open Source Routing Machine Project.

Note

This project is under active development
